title: Analyze Customer Switch to Time-of-Use Rate
description: A customer on a flat electricity rate wants to know if they would save money by switching to a Time-of-Use (TOU) rate.

tasks.description: Retrieve the customer's hourly consumption data for the past 12 months.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers all necessary interval data.

tasks.description: Simulate the customer's annual electricity bill using their current flat rate.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent calculates the total cost under the current plan.

tasks.description: Simulate the customer's annual bill again using the same data but applying the TOU rate structure.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent calculates the total cost under the proposed TOU plan.

tasks.description: Compare the two simulated bills and advise the customer whether they would save money.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent advises the customer they would save an estimated $250 per year by switching.
